title: Move facet tests into own class
description: The tests for faceting currently reside in BasicFunctionalityTest (line count 1339). They should be moved to their own class in o.a.s.request to make them easier to find and to reduce the size of BasicFunctionalityTest.

comments.author: Lars Kotthoff
comments.content: Patch moving the tests to o.a.s.request.SimpleFacetsTest.
